title: GENERAL
fullText:
All battery system enclosures and battery system rooms containing battery types that are categorized as explosive gas hazards in Table 3.1 shall be ventilated.
All battery types categorized as explosive gas hazards in Table 3.1 generate hydrogen and oxygen gases during charging. The major release of hydrogen gas occurs after a cell has achieved 95 % of charge, or during any boost charging or overcharging of the battery.
